body.p:
Henderson Ky Sep 21st/ 61
Hon B Magoffin
Gov State Ky
Sir
I hereby tender my resignation as Captain in the State Guard of Ky

Very Respectfully
E G Hall
Capt Henderson Guards
Ky State Guard
accepted
B. Magoffin
Comr in Chief
